review_data.title: Come here for the falafel:)
review_data.content: This place is best for home made delicious falafel. Warns your soul on a cold winter day. Loved the owners as well.

review_data.title: After drinks hip style
review_data.content: Popped into this little gem for an afternoon drink and some nibbles. Great experience wonderful atmosphere. Great service with a teal good vibe.

review_data.title: Best Halal Kebab
review_data.content: The whole family loves the Falafel and Kebab from Sesam Falafel. Best Halal take away, we come every year and it’s always the best one. Thank you

review_data.title: So good!!!!
review_data.content: Perfect for a light lunch or dinner, good prices and very nice people. If you like falafel or are looking for a vegetarian place to eat, this is the place.

review_data.title: Best Falafel in town

review_data.title: Super Falafel sowie auch Kebab - TOP
review_data.content: Sehr freundliches Personal - schnelle Bedienung und natürlich super frische zubereitete Kebab und Falafel. Top!

review_data.title: Best Falafel in Town Zürich
review_data.content: Wir waren in Sesam falafelbar habe dort seher feine falaffel und kebab gegessen. Und seher freundliche Bedienung.. Zum weiter Empfehlen...More

review_data.title: Best wrap in Zurich
review_data.content: Get the spicy one ...we ordered two under the rain and the taste was good and trust me u’ll remember it

review_data.title: Best Falafel in Zurich
review_data.content: If you would like to have a quick bite, an arabian style. go for Falafel sandwitch at Sesam Falafel bar. Excellent taste.

review_data.title: Top Falafel in Zürich
review_data.content: Wer Falafel liebt ist hier bestens aufgehoben. Der frische orientalische (genauer: israelische) Falafel ist ein besonderer Genuss. Dass es sich...More

review_data.title: Humus & Falafel Mükemmel!
review_data.content: Merkezde uygun fiyatlı ve lezzetli bir yemek için ideal! Falafel oldukça doyurucu ve humus muhteşem!

review_data.title: Kebap in fladenbrot
review_data.content: Tasty, good price. Falafal is good too. There can be a queue at peak lunch time but there is always space at the stand-up tables in front.

review_data.title: schnelle Verpflegung
review_data.content: Geeignet fürs schnelle Verpflegung und empfehlenswert, wenn dass Wetter geignet ist, auf einer Bank in der Nähe Platz zu nehmen.

review_data.title: Καλο και οικονομικο
review_data.content: Πολυ καλο street food στην καρδια της Ζυριχης.Μεγαλη ποικιλια και οικονομικο γρηγορο φαγητο το εχω επισκεφτει πολυ φορες.

review_data.title: Restaurante simples que serve Kebab delicioso!

review_data.title: Awesome Cheap Eat
review_data.content: Great little place to grab a Kebab or Falafel. There are different variations e.g wrap, bun or box and prices start from 7 francs. The food tastes great and the service is very friendly!

review_data.title: Excellent Kababs in Zurich
review_data.content: We did a day trip to Zurich to walk around and see the sites. What a beautiful city in December. We happened upon Sesam Falafel and decided to try it as there was a line. Excellent food in a casual atmosphere after having walked around...More

review_data.title: Best Kebabs in town
review_data.content: I have been getting my kebab at this bar in the heart of zurich for years now. Excellent food and service is quick. Kebab is made in front of you, in differerent versions (wrap, in bread or in plate) and you can choose what vegetables...More
